title: Is creating PBE account only for NA ?
body: I have honor lvl 5 and no ban or some restriction on my account, but says "Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again."

replies.body: Not sure about this one, I assume EU will be able to as well.  Flood gates are opening though since it just came back up, so it may come on one at a time.  I can't say for sure, though, so you might want to ask this on the [PBE Opening Thread](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/JtsFmpNI-pbe-sign-ups-are-open).
